system.availability: Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or star system. Bulk Transports are Monstrous Vessels Rivalling or even surpassing in size the mightiest Emperor-Class Battleships. Offloading alone can take months. Slightly Smaller yet no less massive are the Refinery Ships that actively process raw materials en route to their destinations. Prioritises cargo over people.
system.cost: Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed
